actions.recommendation: Further bloods tests and an abdominal ultrasound are recommended as discussed.

Focus on decreasing your waist circumference as it is more than 80 cm which is associated with a higher risk of heart disease and diabetes. To decrease your risk of a cardiovascular events aim for a BMI of <25 and a waist-to-height ratio of <50%.
Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
